title: Butter Chicken
instructions: 1. Marinate chicken with yogurt, turmeric, and chili powder for 1 hour. 2. Heat butter in a pan, add onions and ginger-garlic paste. 3. Add tomatoes and cook until soft. 4. Add garam masala and cook for 2 minutes. 5. Add marinated chicken and cook for 10 minutes. 6. Add cream and simmer for 5 minutes. Garnish with coriander leaves.

title: Spaghetti Aglio e Olio
instructions: 1. Cook spaghetti in salted water until al dente. 2. Heat olive oil in a pan, add garlic, and cook until golden. 3. Add chili flakes and cook for 30 seconds. 4. Toss cooked spaghetti into the pan and mix well. 5. Garnish with parsley and Parmesan.

title: Sweet and Sour Chicken
instructions: 1. Coat chicken in cornstarch and fry until golden. 2. In a separate pan, cook onion and bell pepper. 3. Add pineapple, soy sauce, vinegar, ketchup, and sugar. 4. Stir until sauce thickens, then add fried chicken. 5. Cook for another 2 minutes and serve.

title: Cheeseburger
instructions: 1. Grill the beef patties to desired doneness. 2. Toast the buns on a grill. 3. Place cheese on the patties and melt. 4. Assemble the burger with lettuce, tomato, pickles, ketchup, and mustard.

title: Vegetable Stir-fry
instructions: 1. Heat oil in a pan and add ginger-garlic paste. 2. Add vegetables and stir-fry for 5 minutes. 3. Add soy sauce, sesame seeds, salt, and pepper. Stir well and cook for another 2 minutes.

title: Chocolate Cake
instructions: 1. Preheat the oven to 350°F (175°C). 2. Mix dry ingredients in one bowl and wet ingredients in another. 3. Combine both and mix well. 4. Pour into a greased baking pan and bake for 30 minutes. 5. Let the cake cool before serving.

title: Pancakes
instructions: 1. Mix dry ingredients in a bowl. 2. Whisk together wet ingredients in another bowl. 3. Combine both and stir until smooth. 4. Pour batter onto a hot griddle and cook until golden on both sides.

title: French Fries
ingredients: 4 potatoes, peeled and cut into strips
instructions: 1. Heat oil in a deep fryer. 2. Fry potato strips until golden and crispy. 3. Drain excess oil on paper towels and season with salt.

title: Mojito
instructions: 1. Muddle mint leaves, lime, and sugar in a glass. 2. Add rum and fill the glass with ice. 3. Top with club soda and stir.

title: Chicken Tikka Masala
instructions: 1. Marinate chicken with yogurt and spices for 1 hour. 2. Grill chicken until cooked. 3. In a pan, cook onions and ginger-garlic paste. 4. Add tomatoes and cook until soft. 5. Add grilled chicken and cook for 5 minutes. 6. Stir in cream and simmer for 10 minutes.
